attributes.action: Reconsider the Ultimatum posed to Iraqis asylum seekers here in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Governement, via a leaked home office document is planning to give Iraqis whom reside in the UK, an ultimatum to return to Iraq within 3 weeks or they will lose all their state support.  They are also asking them to sign a  waiver obsolving responsibility of the Uk government if anything should happen to them or their individual families on their return to Iraq

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
